data.eml:eml: Revalidation of the Brazilian genus Discocyrtanus, with description of two new species (Opiliones: Gonyleptidae: Pachylinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kury, Adriano B., Carvalho, Rafael N. (2016): Revalidation of the Brazilian genus Discocyrtanus, with description of two new species (Opiliones: Gonyleptidae: Pachylinae). Zootaxa 4111 (2): 126-144, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.2.2
